trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede Az'rya's darkvision.

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Az'rya wears {@item Ear Cuff of Eminence|RavensCollection} and wields {@item Maelstrom}.

action.name: Multiattack.
entries: Az'rya makes two attacks or short bursts with {@i Maelstrom}.

action.name: Maelstrom
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 12} to hit, range 70/210 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) piercing damage, or {@h}22 ({@damage 4d6 + 8}) piercing damage when making a short burst, which uses three pieces of ammunition.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Az'rya is a 20th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 20}, {@hit +12} to hit with spell attacks). She regains her expended spell slots when she finishes a short or long rest. She knows the following warlock spells:

item.name: Ear Cuff of Eminence
entries: A glistening fire opal, surrounded by white gold filigree set with pearlescent shards of abalone, this piece of jewellery can be set onto the ear.
While you are wearing no armor, your base Armor Class is 10 + your Dexterity modifier + your Charisma modifier and you have advantage on saving throws against spell and other magical effects.

item.name: Orc Thrower
entries: You gain a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. It has the thrown property with a normal range of 20 feet and a long range of 60 feet. When you hit with a ranged attack using this weapon or if the target is either {@condition grappled}, {@condition restrained}, {@condition paralyzed}, {@condition stunned} or {@condition prone}, it deals an extra {@damage 1d8} damage. Immediately after a thrown attack, the weapon flies back to your hand.

entries.name: Short Burst
entries: When making an attack with a short burst weapon, you use your choice of semi-automatic mode or burst mode. Semi-automatic uses one piece of ammunition per attack, and burst mode deals 2d6 additional ballistic damage but uses three pieces of ammunition per attack.
